description: Portrait of young Francis II , Emperor of Austria; 1/2 length; facing slightly left and looking out; in a decorative circular frame with plaque identifying sitter
inscription:
Signature, Title, Date, and Inscription

below image in black: François Joseph/ Grand Prince de Toscana/ Neé le 12 Fev. 1768/ Con Priv. S.C.M.   Gravé par J.E. Mansfeld en 1784/ a Vienne chez Artaria Comp. | in pencil on sheet: 2-12 | on verso in pencil: /C/ Ganjan [?] Aru[?] 282/ 5=ay[?]/ April 14/1842/ [illeg.]
title: Portrait of François Joseph
